directions: In a shallow dish, whisk together honey, soy sauce and garlic.
Reserve left over honey mixture for basting.
Place chops on greased grill over med high heat, close lid and cook. basting 2 times.
ingredients: 4 ingredients, 20 minutes and dinner is served! If you're looking for the perfect boneless pork chops recipe, this is it!
6 pork loin chops, boneless, trimmed of excess fat, 4 oz each
title: Honey Garlic Pork Chops
